Articles.Content:
A linear decoupler for drop tanks.

One that lets you drop a tank mid flight and pick up a new tank when you get back to KSC. Or even if you don't drop your empty tanks, instead of refilling your tanks, you can simply exchange an empty one for a full one.

This would maybe be better in mod request?

This would be neat. Many will say you can use docking ports for that, which is true enough, but a docking port isn't quite the same as a pylon. The very small docking ports are the closest, but they might be a bit wobbly for use-in-atmosphere drop tanks.
One supposes you could use a modified version of the pylon to do this -- you'd probably be able to make use of the module(s) created for the AGU to perform the grab/release mechanism.
